snippet.title: Pohinki Simulator  - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Play now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3400520/Pohinki_Simulator/?beta=0

Pohinki Simulator is a survival game set in a polish neighbourhood, where you need to explore the open world in search for trash in order to survive and gain power. Explore the forgotten streets of Tarnow and find the treasures that others threw away in this abstract reality, filled with secrets waiting to be discovered.

Can you become the most powerful bum alive?



Music Used: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GK-b2NZUrKA
